ai_prompts.description: Comprehensive news and market sentiment extraction prompt

ai_prompts.prompt_content:
Provide comprehensive fundamental analysis for {symbol} including:

VALUATION METRICS:
- P/E ratio (current, 5-year avg, forward)
- PEG ratio, P/S ratio, P/B ratio
- EV/EBITDA, EV/Revenue
- Discounted cash flow estimate (if available)
- Relative valuation vs peers

FINANCIAL HEALTH:
- Revenue growth (5-year trend, TTM)
- Profit margins (gross, operating, net trends)
- Return on equity (ROE), Return on assets (ROA)
- Debt-to-equity ratio, interest coverage
- Free cash flow generation and trends
- Cash position and burn rate (if applicable)

COMPETITIVE POSITION:
- Market share trends
- Competitive advantages (moat)
- Product/service diversification
- Geographic revenue distribution
- R&D investment as % of revenue

RISK FACTORS:
- Regulatory risks
- Competitive threats
- Cyclical exposure
- Key person risk
- Technology disruption risk

Return structured JSON:
{
  "fundamentals": {
    "valuation": {
      "pe_current": X.X, "pe_5yr_avg": X.X, "pe_forward": X.X,
      "peg": X.X, "ps": X.X, "pb": X.X,
      "ev_ebitda": X.X, "dcf_estimate": X
    },
    "financial_health": {
      "revenue_growth_5yr": X.X,
      "margins": {"gross": X.X, "operating": X.X, "net": X.X},
      "returns": {"roe": X.X, "roa": X.X},
      "debt_ratio": X.X,
      "fcf_ttm": X,
      "cash_position": X
    },
    "competitive_position": {
      "market_share": X.X,
      "moat_rating": "strong|moderate|weak",
      "diversification": "high|medium|low"
    },
    "growth_prospects": {
      "revenue_cagr_3yr": X.X,
      "eps_cagr_3yr": X.X,
      "key_growth_drivers": ["driver1", "driver2"]
    },
    "risk_factors": ["risk1", "risk2", "risk3"],
    "overall_quality_score": X.X,
    "last_updated": "YYYY-MM-DD"
  }
}
ai_prompts.description: Comprehensive fundamental analysis prompt with valuation, financial health, and competitive positioning
